name: Truck Escort
description:
Truck Escort

In this short puzzle game, you have to bring trucks to a goal. To do that, you have to pick up and move gems that are cold or hot, in order to change the surrounding environments.

Controls

Mouse left click or finger

Credits

Code, Art, Music and Sounds by Ardos

Engine: GameMaker
Text Renderer: Scribble extension by Juju Adams
Color palette: crazy-moon by Kofkey
Font: Yoster Island

This prototype has been made in 12 hours for the Potat0sJam12h (website in french)
